name: NeoMarketing S.A. DE C. V.
description: Operator of an online subscription service intended to provide monthly subscription organic coffee. The company provides services to get different brands of coffee from the mountains of Chiapas, each month, helping small coffee producers who already have organic certifications and fair trade to sell their coffee to the world.
